about_the_game:
Caution: The game contains flashes of light that can cause epileptic seizures.

Ephemeral Descent is a Singleplayer first-person horror shooter. Explore an old, long-abandoned hospital where you have to fight for your survival.

Most of the time you have to walk and explore the abandoned hospital, to which you came for your missing solidertroup, but things begin to happen that you never would believe.
Also you have to defend yourself from enemys by a gun.
Your main task is to get out alive, but you can only achieve that by surviving the hospital.

Ephemeral Descent contains:
- Different locations
- Different enemys
- Bodycam perspective
- Realistic shooting
- Creepy atmosphere


The game takes about an hour till two.

This Is My First Game That I Developed Myself.
As the sole developer, I would be very happy to receive your criticism in order to keep improving.
